title.rendered: Aqualis ASA : Mandatory notification of trade

content.rendered:
Oslo, 14 October 2014

13 October 2014, Amish Sanghavi, Group Financial Controller in AqualisBraemar, acquired 6’000 shares at an average purchase price of NOK 7.50 per share. Amish Sanghavi has also purchased shares 10 October 2014 (35’000 shares at average purchase price NOK 7.60 per share), 7 October 2014 (16’000 shares at average purchase price of NOK 8.15 per share), 6 October 2014 (8’277 shares at average purchase price of NOK 8.20 per share) and 23 September 2014 (15’000 shares at average purchase price of NOK 8.00 per share).

After these transactions Amish Sanghavi, and related parties, hold 124’178 shares in Aqualis ASA.

*****

Contact:

Christian Opsahl
CFO
+47 901 101 53
christian.opsahl@aqualisbraemar.com

This information is subject of the disclosure requirements pursuant to section 5-12 of the Norwegian Securities Trading Act.
